Prod. ADT Port = 14001 Prod. Orders/ORM = 14002
Epic Order to Corepoint -> 12209 Test / 15209 Prod

channel.name: ORU To Epic
channel.description:
<!-- *** Sentinel Sends ORU's to Port 8000, Mirth will recieve the ORU and splits the ORU to 2 destinations Epic & OnBase *** ******* NOTE the configurations in the Destinations Tab have special configurations in the Edit Teansformer ******** ******* Each Destination deletes unneeded OBX and ORU and TXA segments
MDM Message to Onbase Strip Segments not needed for the Onbase interface, change to MDM remove OBX with Base64 PDF Test Port for MDM / TXA 10.196.16.202 port 33316 Prod Port for MDM / TXA 10.196.19.75 port 44416
Mirth to Epic 10.196.20.245 port 12222 Strip unneeded TXA segments and multiple OBR/OBX not needed for Epic messages -->

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script: var incommingmsg = msg; channelMap.put('incommingmsg',incommingmsg); // mirth post 217116 //var msg=new XML(channelMap.get('incommingmsg').toString());

connector.name: ORU to Epic interface w/o Base64 pdf
ORU to Onbase Base64 PDF enabled strip all other OBX's
ORU with out OBX mesurements to Onbase Test Port for MDM / TXA 10.196.16.202 port 33316

channel.preprocessingScript:
// Modify the message variable below to pre process data
return message;
